contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This regulation applies to the “Accounting Rules for Public Enterprises and Quasi-Governmental Institutions” and the “Accounting Standards for Public Enterprises and Quasi-Governmental Institutions” delegated by the National Pension Act and the Enforcement Decree of the same Act and the Act on the Management of Public Institutions. The purpose is to determine matters necessary for the performance of accounting duties of the National Pension Service. Revised 2013. 2. 28., 2013. 9. 12., [Fully revised 2008. 12. 23.]
